Edward Banks

The disclosure that the taUo bodies found
floating DOM the Mississippi RiUeY aOeye not
the bodies of the three missing civil rights
workers brought no signs Of relief Instead
the chances Of them being found alive haze
diminished more.


The senselesS assassination Of the Wash
ington educator, returning from duty with the
army reserves. further depicts the conditions
existing in our country.


We do not hear too much about the unsolved
murders of Negroes in Chicago. However, a
half dozen haze been killed in the past six
months, Including an elected city official.


The price Of human life is indeed small
With the knowledge that Negroes are stiu
being killed in the North and South pYOVeS
that ne StiA haze little to be proud Of at
times ike these.


Regardless of the men linked in whispers
with these desbicable Sayings, the C0stTa
Nosa, the Ku Kh4x Khan or sOhateUeT group
a large number Of American citizens die each
year.

olpO sunny Ooy ID JOys AAS PVT
is right-"God's in His heaven
airs right with the world" To
start the day with brisk exer-
else or two is my usual routine.
And feeling clipper went past
my usual one-two-three and rest
program.


Monday, I thought to myself,
Is the day I will heed the latest
reports and begin daily regimen
to help combat flabby muscles
and midrif bulge. With this in
mind l did some physical rou-
tines which hadn' tried in more
than six months. In act, ! was
a bit rusty because had failed
to exercise to much during our
recent San Francisco trip.


touched my toes 20 times
instead Of the usual ten. | did
a couple Of minutes Of deep knee
bends and threw in some frog
stances, for good measure. Mar
yelling at my breath control-I
did all sorts of arm and leg
stretches. l pushed. pulled,
showed and even lost balance a
couple Of times.


A brisk, cool shower topped
off my mornings exercise and |
felt like a new woman for the
rest of the day. had vitality
and vim and lots Of vigor. l
hummed, whistled and sang while
I worked. Monday was my day to
do the company books - the
figures fell into place quickly
and the columns balanced without
the least amount Of extra effort.


Monday evening came and l
read for several hours. went
to sleep past midnight and awoke
as usual on the dot Of E am.
Tuesday. AS l prepared to bounce
out of bed. | experienced a small
twinge of pain in my right side.
With less alacrity. l slipped into
my scuffs and made a motion
to do my daily bends and Sit
ups. With groan, LEANED toward
my pinkies, but the old back
wouldn't respond. kept moving
over until touched my toes.


Huffing and putting a bit more,
managed to do some knee bends.
! heard something like the sounds
of Rice Krispies in a bowl of
milk. My tendons and ligaments
we're telling me to take It cas-
Ter.


Not being cowardly-I took a
firm grip on my vanity and
stretched my left leg upward--
do you know that legs just move
upward better at ten years earlier
in your life7


All day Tuesday sat and rose
with effort. I had various kinds
of pains in different places. For
awhile felt like an ancient gran
ny. At any rate. finished my
chores and YEARLY fell into bed.
was too exhausted to read and
soon the sound of rain made me
awaken.


| arose and looked outside
toward the alley and saw a dark
figure standing in the vacant
lot In the back. The man was
walking around aimlessly. |
watched him and when he moved
on | returned to the arms of
Morpheus.


! shall never know why he was
walking in the rain. Perhaps,
he was taking his predawn con-
stiMtional. At least it is an
easier way to get on the road to
physical fitness than my plan.


MORAL-when woman is past
IS. all exercise should be a rough
car drive.


Or in the words of Chinese

Gusts of a political battle in every precinct. ~.

tentions, and the atmosphere be comes he0U- "
Ter. Voters take on a spec i0I character. They
are aleYted to each office being sought by 9
posters, slogans, and rallies. $780, -.-..,---.-..


The gavel has banged at the Republican .1's
National Convention In cool, northern CAL
tfovnio, but the heat wave had eVen reached
the Cow Palace.

soon be threatened. Eager ot1ceseekers
will intensity campaigns, and feveTish out
bursts uTll cast SHADOWS.


There may be little rain but the mud '0'H
APPEAR. No need to ask the u0e0theTn'0n toT
his fore cast. 1t wiu be hotter and cIou0seT
as the political fur continues to tty:
